summary:
The Security Council,

Reaffirming its resolutions 1540 (2004), 1673 (2006), 1810 (2008), and 1977 (2011),

Recalling its decision to extend the mandate of the 1540 Committee until 25 April 2021,

Emphasizing the increased workload of the 1540 Committee,

Recalling its decision to continue providing the 1540 Committee with expert assistance,

Requests the Secretary-General to increase the group of experts to up to nine experts.
